name: IT Room
description: The IT Room houses a network of humming computers amidst neon lights, a digital fortress safeguarding the company's data. Access badges grant entry to restricted IT areas but don't unlock the nearby Server Room. The IT Room stands as a sanctuary of expertise and technology. A [bookshelf] in a corner houses IT reference manuals.
short_description: An IT sanctuary of humming servers and neon lights. A [bookshelf] in the corner is full on manuals.
directions: The IT Room is connected to the [Main Hallway] to the east and the [Server Room] to the west.
